 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָדַשׁ‎</span>] **verb** only **Pi\`el** (and **Hithpa\`el**) ==renew, repair== (in poetry and late) (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חדש‎</span>; noun <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חדש‎</span> ***new moon***, also in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קרתחדשת‎</span> ***new-city*** = ***Carthage***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַדֵּשׁ‎</span>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be new***, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> 1. 2. ***renew***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎החדתֿ‎</span>, see [[BDB#Os|Os]] ([[BDB#Levy|Levy]]):ZMG 1865, 204 [[BDB#Mordt|Mordt]]<sup>ZMG 1876, 30</sup>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***[adâšu], uddiš, renew, eššu***</u></abbr>, ***new***, etc. [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>W 199 ff.</sup>) — 

**Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְחִדְּשׁוּ‎</span> consecutive [[Isa.61.4|Isa 61:4]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְחַדֵּשׁ‎</span> [[2Chr.15.8|2Chr 15:8]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּחַדֵּשׁ‎</span> [[Job.10.17|Job 10:17]]; [[Ps.104.30|Ps 104:30]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּנְחַדֵּשׁ‎</span> [[1Sam.11.14|1Sam 11:14]] ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַדֵּשׁ‎</span> [[Ps.51.21|Ps 51:21]] ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְחַדֵּשׁ‎</span> [[2Chr.24.4|2Chr 24:4]]; [[2Chr.24.12|2Chr 24:12]] — 

**1.** ***renew, make anew*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְּלוּכָה‎</span> [[1Sam.11.14|1Sam 11:14]] (editorial); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פני אדמה‎</span> [[Ps.104.30|Ps 104:30]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחַ‎</span> [[Ps.51.12|Ps 51:12]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּרא‎</span>); = bring back <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָמֵינוּ כְּקֶדֶם‎</span> [[Lam.5.21|Lam 5:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עדיך‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> [[Job.10.17|Job 10:17]] i.e. ***bringest fresh (new) witnesses.*** 

**2.** ***repair***, cities [[Isa.61.4|Isa 61:4]], temple [[2Chr.24.4|2Chr 24:4]]; [[2Chr.24.12|2Chr 24:12]], altar [[2Chr.15.8|2Chr 15:8]]. **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְחַדֵּשׁ‎</span> with plural subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּנֶּשֶׁר נְעוּרָ֑יְכִת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> [[Ps.103.5|Ps 103:5]] ***thy youth reneweth itself, like the eagle.***
